attributes.action: More career support for young adults.
attributes.background: Since connextions has no longer been available to the public, especially young adults, there does not seem to be enough support for career advice. You see young adults and adults in education with no structure on where to go forward. Connextions is a organisation supporting adults with there careers

rejection.details:
We understand you are concerned about a lack of career advice for young people, but we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

The Government does run the National Careers Service, which provides careers advice and support:

https://nationalcareersservice.direct.gov.uk/contact-us-v1/home-v1

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what action you would like to see.
